title: 48th Annual Brighton Jubilee
description: Brighton Beach Avenue between Corbin Place + Coney Island Ave.

title: 41st Pakistan Day Parade
description: Madison Ave between E 38th St to E 27th St.

title: 25th Jersey City Pride Equality March/Rally and Festival
description: Rally starts at 11:30am; march kicks off at 1pm; the festival runs 1pm-9pm.

title: Great Jones Distilling Co. Fourth Anniversary
Planet Brooklyn
description: A new two-day music festival featuring ticketed shows at Barclays Center, Brooklyn Paramount, and BAM, plus a block party in front of BAM (Fort Greene).

title: Night at the Movies: An M. Night Shyamalan Retrospective
description: 2-for-1 double bills placing Shyamalan's features alongside a film of his choosing, with Shyamalan in-person at select screenings.
cost: $17 general, $14 students, seniors, persons with disabilities

title: Summers of Change
description: Aftersun, Call Me By Your Name, Do the Right Thing, Summer with Monika, and more.

title: Seven Scenes at Little Island
description: Outdoor evening of dance and live music at the amph at Little Island (Meatpacking District).

title: Summerstage: Charlie Parker Jazz Festival
description: Annual Charlie Parker Jazz Festival for three evenings.

title: Fifth Annual Rockaway Beach Surf Music Festival
description: Catch a wave and ride three nights of twangy guitars featuring nine east coast surf bands.

title: Tale Storytelling Show
description: An evening of performances by some of the city’s best storytellers, hosted by Harmon Leon.
address: The Red Room at KGB Bar, East Village
cost: $15 (half price online with promo code ‘discountskint’) plus a two-drink minimum.

title: Bryant Park Picnic Performances
description: Free live music, theater, and dance in the heart of midtown.

title: Rooftop Films Presents
description: A night of short films with filmmaker Q+A, live music, and an afterparty.

title: Laugh It Off
description: Comedians try their best to ‘fix’ audience members' everyday problems.

title: Bitches Brew Comedy Show
description: Women-produced and-hosted comedy show with various performers.
cost: Free (tip jar will be passed around at the end of the show).

title: Take Me to Your Best Friend's House: An Indie Sleaze Dance Party
description: Dance to indie rock, dance-punk, and bloghouse bands spun by DJs.
